'''Cecilia Monroe''' is a fictional actress that used to play [[Jessica Lockhart]] on ''[[Days of our Lives]]''. She was portrayed by [[Susan Sarandon]].

[[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]]'s [[Dr. Drake Ramoray|character]] on ''Days Of Our Lives'' will finally come out of the coma after they transplant a woman's brain. When Joey consults the actress (Cecilia Munroe, played by Susan Sarandon) about how to best play her character once he is supposed to "become" her, she did not know she was being killed off and flips out. She then agrees to help him because she owes it to her character, leading the two to eventually hook up. After handing over the role of Jessica Lockhart to Joey, Cecilia Monroe sleeps with Joey causing minor hysteria for [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]] and [[Monica Geller|Monica]], who both are big fans of ''Days of our Lives''. She then finds a role in Mexico, resulting in she and Joey breaking up amicably and her disappearance from the show.

==Trivia==
* The actress [[Eva Amurri]] playing Dina, Jessica Lockhart's daughter, is the real life daughter of Susan Sarandon.
